clues.text: A street sign with this letter pair denotes a crossing that has the ties that bind

007 film song in which Paul & Linda McCartney wrote of "this ever-changing world in which we live in"

Alliterative term for a contest in which the last car still running wins

rounds.text: The traditional inaugural lunch for this president & V.P. featured boiled stuffed lobster & prime ribs of beef au jus
